--- newsList.graphql
query {
  newsList {
    pageInfo {
      startCursor
      endCursor
      hasNextPage
      hasPreviousPage
    }
    edges {
      cursor
      node {
        ...NewsFragment
      }
    }
    nodes {
      ...NewsFragment
    }
  }
}

fragment NewsFragment on News {
  id
  newsId
  date
  message
  messageJa
  link
}


--- Result
{"data":{"newsList":{"pageInfo":{"startCursor":null,"endCursor":"News:1","hasNextPage":false,"hasPreviousPage":false},"edges":[{"cursor":"News:4","node":{"id":"News:4","newsId":"4","date":"2018-11-12","message":"Videos of the sessions are now available.","messageJa":"セッションの動画を公開しました","link":"https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5y9uEm8_ypUSnD4TbKKH_7935GxkbgGv"}},{"cursor":"News:3","node":{"id":"News:3","newsId":"3","date":"2018-11-12","message":"Slides from the sessions are now available.","messageJa":"セッションのスライドを公開しました","link":"https://speakerdeck.com/mercari"}},{"cursor":"News:2","node":{"id":"News:2","newsId":"2","date":"2018-09-28","message":"The list of exhibition booths is now up on our website!","messageJa":"展示ブースの内容を公開しました","link":""}},{"cursor":"News:1","node":{"id":"News:1","newsId":"1","date":"2018-09-04","message":"Tickets are on sale.","messageJa":"チケット販売をオープンしました","link":""}}],"nodes":[{"id":"News:4","newsId":"4","date":"2018-11-12","message":"Videos of the sessions are now available.","messageJa":"セッションの動画を公開しました","link":"https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5y9uEm8_ypUSnD4TbKKH_7935GxkbgGv"},{"id":"News:3","newsId":"3","date":"2018-11-12","message":"Slides from the sessions are now available.","messageJa":"セッションのスライドを公開しました","link":"https://speakerdeck.com/mercari"},{"id":"News:2","newsId":"2","date":"2018-09-28","message":"The list of exhibition booths is now up on our website!","messageJa":"展示ブースの内容を公開しました","link":""},{"id":"News:1","newsId":"1","date":"2018-09-04","message":"Tickets are on sale.","messageJa":"チケット販売をオープンしました","link":""}]}}}
